body_html: Useful links! I compiled the op independently with bazel and it worked, I can use it in python. As far as I know I can't use it in c++. But how to add dependencies to other libraries in the bazel build file? I would like to use some Eigen functions in the op.
body_text: Useful links! I compiled the op independently with bazel and it worked, I can use it in python. As far as I know I can't use it in c++. But how to add dependencies to other libraries in the bazel build file? I would like to use some Eigen functions in the op.
body: Useful links! I compiled the op independently with bazel and it worked, I can use it in python. As far as I know I can't use it in c++. But how to add dependencies to other libraries in the bazel build file? I would like to use some Eigen functions in the op.
